text: Group A of UEFA Women's Euro 2017 had teams like Belgium, Denmark, Netherlands, and Norway. They played their matches from the 16th to the 24th of July in 2017. ==Teams== Draw position Team Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best
